steps: Tap on 'WLAN' and select Scenic Guest.
Enter the password Spaceship1 and click on the view more option.
Scroll down to MAC address type and select the 'Phone MAC' option.
You are now connected to the WLAN.
Select the Scenic Guest WLAN and enter the password Spaceship1.
Deactivate the private WLAN address and click on 'Next'.
Exit the 'Settings' — you are now connected to the WLAN.
